question: Which country has recently banned Islamist outfit ‘Allar Dol’ from entering into its territory?
explanation: Government of Bangladesh has banned the Islamist outfit ‘Allar Dol’ saying that it poses threat to public safety and security. Allar Dol is the ninth Islamist group to be banned for extremism and militancy in Bangladesh. Allar Dol was formed in 1995 with the aim to establish Caliphate through armed struggle. In 2004 it merged with banned militant organisation Jama’atul Mujahideen Bangladesh (JMB).
